Row.Text: ...I can't believe it. Lastation is totally ruined...and it's all my fault. If only Noire were here, I might could have...[NEWLINE]...why was I even born? I could never even halfway measure up to her, and with her gone, look what happened. I'm just a failure, through and through.[NEWLINE]Well, what are you waiting for?! Go ahead and put me out of my misery, you bastard!

Hmph, and who would you be? With clothes that expensive-looking, I can't help but think you're the ruler of another nation. I knew it! Threaten us and I'll put a bullet in your head. No ifs, ands, or buts. I don't mince words.
What can Lastation and its majesty do for you?
Hope your empire is faring as well as my aim is accurate. What do you need?
Hmm, it's you. What do you want?
Come to admire Lastation? I don't blame you, Noire didn't build the greatest nation in the world for nothing!
I'm a busy CPU, so make this quick.
I have a gun three times the size of my body, and I'm holding it with one hand. So yes, choose your words very carefully.
And just what the hell do you want? I'm not the forgiving type, so don't even bother trying to make amends for the stuff you've done!
It's not like I like you or anything.[NEWLINE]Do note that I didn't stutter a bit. I really meant it -- I don't like you at all.
Then there's nothing else to say. Target locked.
The odds aren't in my favor. I suppose that just means I'll have to fight dirty.
I'll smite you. Let's go, then.
In the name of Noire and Lastation, I'll blow your brains out.
Good aim and tactics overcome superior firepower. You'll soon find that out personally.
You're about to regret ever being born. I might just make you suffer with my poisoned bullets.

Idiot! Unbelievable idiot! Moronic idiot! Atrocious idiot! Mindless idiot! You're just a damn idiot, idiot, idiot!![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

Damn loser. I bet you're the kind of person who actually likes the endless barrage of waifubait softcore-porn games that comprise nearly the entire library of our newest handheld console, aren't you? I bet you are, you pathetic virgin![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
?![NEWLINE][COLOR:127:127:127:255](You decided to denounce her by comparing her quite unfavorably to her sister. She seems so hurt that she can't even form a response.)[ENDCOLOR]
...[NEWLINE]I. Do. NOT. Pad my bra.[NEWLINE]Oooooh, you are going to pay for that remark in spades...

Our people are now buying your blue jeans and listening to your pop music.[NEWLINE]I-idiot. I don't dance to that music, and I certainly wasn't just trying on a new pair of those jeans on in front of the mirror so I could see if they made my butt look nicer! Pervert!
It's time for Lastation to expand its markets...forcefully. Not to mention, your soldiers look like good target practice!
Let's see how you handle combat against a CPU of Lastation! We're going to meet on the battlefield...and you better not chicken out!

I'm going to stop at nothing to make Lastation the greatest nation in the world, even if it means wiping yours off the face of the earth! I've already locked on you as my next target, there is no negotiation to be had! Prepare yourself!

You remember the whole tsundere act I was giving you, all that "I-it's not like I like you or anything" crap?[NEWLINE]Well, I really DON'T like you. And you're about to find out just how much I really don't!
Kei is allowing this deal to be renewed without alteration. Having her agree to not jack up the price of something is a rarity, so you really oughta take it.
Alright then.
Hm, fair enough.
I'd be fool not to accept an offer that generous.
Hmph, well...I suppose I can thank you, just this once.
Well, I guess even an idiot can make good decisions once in a while.
Are you stupid? I said no!
Y-you're gonna make me hate you if you keep being so persistent! Jeez!

D-don't get the wrong idea! Y-you just happened to have this stuff and didn't need it! I guess it just can't be helped, I'll have to take it![NEWLINE]...okay, maybe that only works if I was the one giving something to you, not the other way around...
You actually thought you could win against a Lastation CPU? Is your brain screwed in right? Hahaha!
...I've really messed this up. I needed a lot more training and studying military tactics before fighting a war like this. Well...what are your terms, then? Let's get this over with.
Well, I guess I'm ready to give this war a bit of a break if you are.
Target locked! Now, you better choose your words carefully!
I have a gun pointed at your face, moron! Do I LOOK like I want peace?
Lastation isn't willing to accept this deal. Now, I'll be nice and broker a new deal with you before Kei gets here.[NEWLINE]...you better not look too far into that! I-it doesn't mean anything!
Whoa, Kei would have my head if I tried to pay for that. No thanks.
Jeez, and I thought that swimsuit I bought was costly! I'm not about to pay for something that pricey!
It's a better deal than you deserve. Don't misunderstand, though! It's for Lastation's benefit to get the stuff you're offering. That's all!
Are you stupid? We're not gonna make some idiotic deal like that!
You lead the charge against {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}, and I'll be behind you providing the support!
There's no denying your military superiority. My focus has faltered; I must rectify this situation immediately.
Hmm, I'll trade you some of these prototype rifles I've been tinkering with for some manpower? I think you've got more than enough of the latter, huh?
Your economy dwarfs that of Lastation. Perhaps I have had too much of a single-minded focus on technology and military training.
There's just no way you can have that much money! You must be supplementing your income with Guild quests or something!
An idiot like you is caught up in a war, huh? I bet you'll just fall off your horse on the way to the battle and break your neck, with how dumb you are.
If your skill with weaponry is even half that of mine, you should win your war in no time flat. Good luck.
Wow, what a pathetic army you've got. Glad there are people like you around to help me feel better about my own shortcomings!
You think you can scare Lastation with your reputation of pure terror? I-it's not gonna work...I mean, it's not gonna work! It really isn't!

Wait, you and {1_CivName} are friends now? I-I guess that makes two of you who aren't quite so stupid! It can't be helped, I guess I'll have to be the lynchpin that holds this three-way friendship together!
You and {1_CivName} being friends? Makes sense, takes an idiot to know an idiot.

U-uhh-umm! Look, th-this is a special occasion, so you better listen up, I'm not repeating myself! W-w-w-would you, um, well...like to, well...de-de-declare fr-fr-fr-friendship with me? I mean, with Lastation! Ahhh, jeez! You better not get any weird ideas about this, idiot! This is nothing but a savvy political move, of course I'd never think you were a great person that I'd wanna be friends with! Never ever! Hmph!

L-look. I...well, I really know that it'd be dangerous to declare war on {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} alone, and I could use some help. I-if you would be my war ally against them, well, I'd really appreciate it...argh, don't get the wrong idea about this though! It's a military alliance out of necessity, nothing more! Got it?!
I...I'm just gonna go lock myself in my room and put some tacticool attachments on my rifles for a while until you decide to dismantle those nukes of your own accord...
I guess it can't be helped. I'll listen to your offers for now.
Try any sneaky deals and Kei will probably follow up with a lawsuit, so watch yourself.
I suppose it can't be helped. I'll offer this Research Agreement to your nation so that you can reap the benefits of Lastation's technological marvels. You better accept!

I caught your spy attempting to imprint a bunch of illegally copied games in Lastation. Since you seem so set on destroying my economy, you better watch out or you'll find yourself on the wrong end of my gun.

Not that I expect some moron like you to understand this, but do you understand what happens when you pirate technological secrets? You stifle competition and business, leading to stagnation of the industry! You're not going to succeed in anything but ruining the gaming economy - not just of Lastation, but the entire world! You better cease these covert piracy operations, or I'm going to cease them for you.
Your spy was attempting to pirate a bunch of games in my Lastation. Do you really not know how bad that is for Gamindustri? Consider this a fair warning and a bit of education for you.

I'm going to give you the benefit of the doubt about the recent spat of piracy in Lastation and assume that you just haven't taken a course in simple economics to understand why it's going to bring ruin to game developers everywhere. Let's get those spies of yours out of Lastation then, hm?
